mapper.sql: id, login_code, login_pass, tn_name, tn_addr, tn_extro_info, create_date
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO saas_tenant ( login_code, login_pass, tn_name, tn_addr, tn_extro_info, create_date ) VALUES ( #{loginCode}, #{loginPass}, #{tnName}, #{tnAddr}, #{tnExtroInfo}, #{createDate} )
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS ID
mapper.update:
UPDATE saas_tenant
login_code = #{loginCode},
login_pass = #{loginPass},
tn_name = #{tnName},
tn_addr = #{tnAddr},
tn_extro_info = #{tnExtroInfo},
create_date = #{createDate},
WHERE id = #{id}

UPDATE saas_tenant
login_code = #{map.loginCode},
login_pass = #{map.loginPass},
tn_name = #{map.tnName},
tn_addr = #{map.tnAddr},
tn_extro_info = #{map.tnExtroInfo},
create_date = #{map.createDate},
WHERE id = #{map.id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO saas_tenant ( login_code, login_pass, tn_name, tn_addr, tn_extro_info, create_date ) VALUES ( #{map.loginCode}, #{map.loginPass}, #{map.tnName}, #{map.tnAddr}, #{map.tnExtroInfo}, #{map.createDate} )
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM saas_tenant
AND id like CONCAT('%', #{id} , '%')
AND login_code like CONCAT('%', #{loginCode} , '%')
AND login_pass like CONCAT('%', #{loginPass} , '%')
AND tn_name like CONCAT('%', #{tnName} , '%')
AND tn_addr like CONCAT('%', #{tnAddr} , '%')
AND tn_extro_info like CONCAT('%', #{tnExtroInfo} , '%')
AND create_date like CONCAT('%', #{createDate} , '%')
ORDER BY ${orderBy} ${sortBy}
